soccer

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player instance acting as a container for information regarding the player. Information assigned by the database Controller

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int id,
              java.lang.String name,
              int number)
       throws NameLengthException,
              NumberLengthException,
              IdLengthException
        Player constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Player ID length can't be over 7 digits
        name - name of the player. Max 20 digits
        number - number of the player. [0,100[
        Throws:
        NameLengthException - Length of name too long
        NumberLengthException - Number is not between [0,100[
        IdLengthException - id is either negative or it's length is above 7 digits
